docs: Allow users to convert AZERO into sAZERO
Mints the caller sAZERO based on the redemption ratio
Minimum AZERO amount is required to stake
AZERO must be transferred via transferred_value
messages.label: stake

docs: Allow user to begin the unlock process
Transfers sAZERO specified in `shares` argument to the vault contract
Unlock is batched into current two era batch request
Caller must approve the psp22 token contract beforehand
messages.label: request_unlock

docs: Allow user to cancel their unlock request
Must be done in the same batch interval in which the request was originally sent
messages.label: cancel_unlock_request

docs: Trigger unlock requests of previous batched requests
Distributes unlock requests to nominators according to current stake imbalances
Calculates a batch spot values for sAZERO in the batches
Burns associated sAZERO
Cannot be called for a batch that has not concluded
Cannot be called for a batch that has already been redeemed
Batch IDs must be specified in ascending order (for gas efficient duplicate check)
messages.label: send_batch_unlock_requests

docs: Attempts to claim unbonded AZERO from all validators
messages.label: delegate_withdraw_unbonded

docs: Allows a user to withdraw staked AZERO
Returns original deposit amount plus interest to depositor address
Queries the redeemable amount by user AccountId and Claim Vector index
Associated batch unlock request must have been completed
Deletes the user's unlock request
Burns the associated sAZERO tokens
messages.label: redeem

docs: Alternative method for a user to withdraw staked AZERO
This should be called instead of `redeem()` when insufficient AZERO exists in the Vault and
validator(s) have unbonded AZERO which can be claimed
messages.label: redeem_with_withdraw

docs: Compound earned interest for all validators
Can be called by anyone
Caller receives an AZERO incentive based on the total AZERO amount compounded
messages.label: compound

docs: Claim fees by inflating sAZERO supply
Caller must have the owner role (`role_owner`)
Mints virtual shares as sAZERO to the owner
Effectively serves as a compounding for protocol fee
sets total_shares_virtual to 0
messages.label: withdraw_fees

docs: Update the minimum stake amount
Caller must have the owner role (`role_owner`)
messages.label: adjust_minimum_stake

docs: Upgrade the contract by the ink env set_code_hash function
Caller must have the owner role (`role_owner`)
See ink documentation for details https://paritytech.github.io/ink/ink_env/fn.set_code_hash.html
messages.label: set_code

docs: Transfers ownership to a new account
Caller must have the owner role (`role_owner`)
messages.label: transfer_role_owner

docs: Update the protocol fee
Caller must have the adjust fee role (`role_adjust_fee`)
Updates the total_shares_virtual accumulator at the old fee level first
messages.label: adjust_fee

docs: Update the compound incentive
Caller must have the adjust fee role (`role_adjust_fee`)
messages.label: adjust_incentive

docs: Transfers adjust fee role to a new account
Caller must be the admin for the adjust fee role (`role_adjust_fee_admin`)
messages.label: transfer_role_adjust_fee

docs: Transfers administration of adjust fee role to a new account
Caller must be the admin for the adjust fee role (`role_adjust_fee_admin`)
messages.label: transfer_role_adjust_fee_admin

docs: Returns the total amount of bonded AZERO
messages.label: get_total_pooled

docs: Returns the shares effectively in circulation by the protocol including:
1) sAZERO that has already been minted
2) sAZERO that could be minted (virtual) representing accumulating protocol fees
messages.label: get_total_shares

docs: Returns the protocol fees (sAZERO) which can be minted and withdrawn at the current block timestamp
messages.label: get_current_virtual_shares

docs: Calculate the value of AZERO in terms of sAZERO
messages.label: get_shares_from_azero

docs: Calculate the value of sAZERO in terms of AZERO
messages.label: get_azero_from_shares

docs: Returns the unlock requests for a given user
messages.label: get_unlock_requests

docs: Returns the number of unlock requests made by a given user
messages.label: get_unlock_request_count

docs: Returns the information of a batch unlock request for the given batch id
messages.label: get_batch_unlock_requests

docs: Calculate the value of sAZERO in terms of AZERO with TARGET_DECIMALS precision
messages.label: RateProvider::get_rate
